nodes.text: The B'ankora Refuge was a small sanctuary on Coruscant given by Supreme Chancellor Chasen Piian of the Galactic Republic in perpetuity to surviving members of the B'ankora species in 131 BBY.

Sometime after the rise of the Galactic Empire, the B'ankora were forcefully removed from their reserve and brought to the lifeless Mid Rim world Parau VI, where they continued their sedentary lifestyle until the species was rendered extinct by 0 BBY.
